title: Luchnix
author: Luchnix
content: After the fear in the heart of investors for the further decline of BTC, the huge question was should I pull off or still hold back?Here is your answer;Following the presidential announcement on the U.S strategic crypto reserve, which didnâ€™t only include BTC and ETH, other tokens such as XRP and ADA was featured.Now, this alone gave investors the big mind to still buy and hold on their positions as we saw a 37% increase in the past 24hr trading volume..Having BTC in the U.S strategic crypto reserve watchlist is a pointer that Bitcoin still has a place here in the crypto space.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: All I can say is that real investors never feel panic about the decline, but traders do. Why? Investors never lose any as they don't sell any, but traders do as they can't make a profit from the declining situation of the market.But we can't deny that Trump's announcement has had a huge impact on the market momentum, and witnessing this kind of change makes us think that the US can likely manipulate the market.This is not the 1st thing to happen in the market, and probably more will be seen in the coming days. That is why investors often think that news is a big factor in deciding when to buy and when to sell.
